mapper.insert: insert into bu.wq_tutor_review (rating, comment, create_by, create_time, update_time) values (#{rating,jdbcType=REAL}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update bu.wq_tutor_review set rating = #{rating,jdbcType=REAL}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, rating, comment, create_by, create_time, update_time from bu.wq_tutor_review
